subtitle: majority of the cases in the beginning
came from countries where reincarnation
was acceptable there are significant
cases from the US recently in particular
but it's thought that in places in like
the United States where it's
predominantly a Christian or
judeo-christian country if a child
starts to speak about reincarnation that
the parents will repress the memories or
say what are you talking about or you
know to them it's the work of the devil
or something like that but in in places
like India or in Israel where there's
the Drew culture where they accept
reincarnation if a child starts speaking
about a past lifetime the parents are
more receptive and typically these cases
came from Asia in the beginning the
child would speak a non-english language
and the case would come to the attention
of of a local newspaper the newspaper
would publish an article on this
reincarnation case and then eventually
Dr Stevenson would learn about this and
he developed a network of contacts all
over the world who he worked with and
they would funnel cases to him basically
and then he would travel to those
locations
